name: Shoemaker, Appellant, v. Lehigh Valley Coal Company

judges: Before Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boil and McBride, JJ.
parties: Shoemaker, Appellant, v. Lehigh Valley Coal Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the opinion of Judge Frank L. Pinola, 16 Pa. D. & C. 2d 770.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Mitchell Jenkins, with him Charles H. Miner, Jr., for appellant.
James P. Harris, with him Jonathan C. Valentine, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Shoemaker, Appellant, v. Lehigh Valley Coal Company.
Argued April 30, 1959.
Before Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boil and McBride, JJ.
Mitchell Jenkins, with him Charles H. Miner, Jr., for appellant.
James P. Harris, with him Jonathan C. Valentine, for appellee.
May 28, 1959:
